password_pattern: The password must be at least 8 characters, uppercase and lowercase letters, and numbers.
name: First name
only_letters: This field must only contain letters
only_letters_and_numbers: This field must only contain letters and numbers
min_invalid: This field must have at least {{number}} characters
max_invalid: This field must not be longer than {{number}} characters
enter_email: Enter your email address to be sent  a verification code
enter_verification_code: Enter the verification code from the email you received.
forgot_password_success: Code sent successfully. Please check your email
resend_token: If you did not receive a verification code,
life_story_content: Use this template to start the collaborative process of inviting others to share their memories of someone who has passed away. Capture the impact of their life with memories of the life they lived and the love they shared. Select Next after you have chosen your template.
classmates_story_content: Use this template to start the collaborative process of inviting others to share their memories of shared experiences in a class environment (e.g., school classes, military training classes, business training classes).  Capture the fun, the challenges, and the life changing moments of the class. Select Next after you have chosen your template.
teammates_story_content: Use this template to start the collaborative process of inviting others to share their memories of shared experiences on a team (e.g., youth teams, travel teams, high school teams, college teams, and professional teams) together by game, by season – or just anyway you want to do it.  Capture the fun moments in the locker room or on the field, the challenges, the life lessons, and the joy of being a part of a team. Select Next after you have chosen your template.
none_of_this_story_content: Use this template to start the collaborative process of inviting others to share their memories of any event that doesn’t fall within the other templates. Let your desire to capture key moments of a shared life experience with others drive the creation and collaborative process. Select Next after you have chosen your template.
select_cover: Select a cover image for your story
click_to_upload: Click to upload a file or drag and drop
title: Title
rich_text_description: Write general information about the deceased that you would like to share as an overall summary – think of things that will spark memories to be shared from others
link_oportunity: Link for opportunity to donate in memory of the deceased
enter_classname: Enter the name of the class
write_general_information: Write general information about the class that you would like to share
enter_team_name: Enter the name of the event
enter_name_of_team: Enter the name of the team
enter_name_of_league: Enter the name of the league
select_prompts: It is recommended to keep all prompts selected. The selected prompts will be used to spark the creativity of your collaborators when sharing memories for the collaborative story you are building together
share_a_memory_life: Share a Memory of how this person positively affected your life
share_a_memory_person: Share a Memory of a fun time with this person
share_a_memory_working: Share a Memory of working with this person
share_a_memory_other: Share a Memory of anything else that captures the essence of the life this person lived
share_a_memory_fun: Share a Memory of a fun time some or all of you had together
share_a_memory_challenge: Share a Memory of a challenge some or all of you faced and overcame
share_a_memory_group: Share a Memory of the group doing an activity together
share_a_memory_other2: Share a Memory of anything else that captures the time you spent together
share_a_memory_team: Share a Memory of some fun team antics
share_a_memory_win: Share a Memory of a big win or loss that had an impact on the team
share_a_memory_team2: Share a Memory of how you came together as a team
share_a_memory_fan: Share a Memory of an interaction some or all of you had with fans
share_a_memory_other3: Share a Memory of something that captures your experience
share_a_memory_fun2: Share a Memory of something fun
share_a_memory_challenge2: Share a Memory of something challenging
share_a_memory_other4: Share a Memory of anything else that captures the essence
click_create: Click “Create” to get started sharing your memories and adding collaborators!
congrats: Congratulations, you have created your Memvy!
choose_memory: You can now choose to add collaborators to upload memories to your Memvy or you can begin adding your own memories before doing so.  Memvy recommends you invite collaborators first so that everyone is adding memories while you are.
add_text: Add a short description for this item
add_image: Add an image for this item
add_audio: Add an audio for this item
add_video: Add a video for this item
share_memory: Share a Memory of how this person positively affected your life
add_video_memory: Click to add a Video Memory
add_image_memory: Click to add an Image Memory
add_audio_memory: Click to add an Audio Memory
add_text_memory: Click to add a Text Memory
only_letters_numbers_spaces: This field must only contain letters and numbers and spaces
click_here_to_upload: Click here to upload your Primary Media, or drag and drop the file here
provide_more_background: Provide more background on this memory
add_complementary_media: Add complimentary media to this memory
are_you_sure: Are you sure you want to delete this Memory?
memory_going_deleted: The following Memory will be permanently deleted.
are_you_sure_want: Are you sure you want that?
add_multiple_collaborators: You can add multiple emails, separating them with a comma
umembr_allows: MEMVY allows you to upload memories in the form of Text, Video, Image, or Audio
select_continue: Select continue when you are ready to start collaborating!
please_enter_valid: Please enter valid emails separated by commas.
are_you_sure_story: Are you sure you want to delete this Memvy?
story_coing_deleted: The following story will be permanently deleted.

to_view_this: To view this private Memvy, please enter the access code below.
